summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the Allegro diffusion pipeline, including fast unit tests with mocked components and full integration tests using real models. The tests check key features such as attention slicing, callback execution, inference output correctness, model serialization, and VAE tiling, while ensuring deterministic behavior and proper resource handling.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, stability, and reproducibility of the Allegro diffusion pipeline before deployment, guaranteeing that core functionalities work as expected and that models can be saved, loaded, and executed reliably.
